channel.title: [PI] Changing the client background - PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
Alright, first of all here is some information you need to know. I do NOT have a sprites folder or a sprites.java. All I have is sprite.java.
I have my background ready, I just need someone to help me change it. I've searched endlessly on how to do it and I just couldn't figure it out.
If someone could please help me, possible through Team Viewer, please add my skype 'DigitalPk3r'
